title: 92x4: Applicability of the Honoraria Ban to Compensation for Writing Scripts for Television Show
summary:
The honoraria ban does not apply to works of fiction, poetry, lyrics, or scripts.  

Notes: [Note: The honoraria ban was held unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court in U.S. v. National Treasury Employees Union, 513 U.S. 454 (1995).]
